content: before previous turn ssk turn sl1 pp to last stitch before previous turn p2tog turn repeat last 2 row until there are no more side stitches to incorporate thank you for downloading this pattern if you have any questions or comments please do not hesitate to contact me at wanderingcatstudio@hotmail com fine knitting fibres can be purchased at wanderingcatyarns etsy com copyright statement pattern designed by valerie johnson wandering cat studio 2019 user may not copy and/or distribute pattern for profit or otherwise
